Great puzzle game, had me puzzled for a puzzling amount of time. The story line puzzles me, and so does the cake which is a puzzling lie. I am puzzled about what I am recommending this game with and am puzzled what I am even doing here; to put it blatantly I am puzzled.
gratificante a sensaÃ§Ã£o de vitoria porem frustrante o processo

Orange box was greatest Valve achievement, not spaced gnome chompski, not gaben's beard, not hunted game studios and talanted developers, not cs/tf2 crates, keys, skins, not Dust2. Time of feared not experiments, time without monetization. Speaking the truth, i found out that Valve's monopoly politics similar to Marvel, by the nature they lost all their talent, and in need to constantly search for new blood with new ideas, portal or left 4 dead, dota, or rebrand their old ones - team fortress, counter strike, half life. Gaben is Stan Lee in videogame industry. Cake is a lie.
